name: Auditory Touch
description:
Requirements:
Meant for an Oculus VR Headset. Works natively on PC, with a separate APK file for the Oculus Quest.

Description/Gameplay:

Auditory Touch is a chill VR experience where you can "feel" spatial audio using haptics.

Move your right hand around in the scene to spatially interact with 4 different audio tracks. As your hand moves around, you will feel the procedural haptic representations of audio.
